short_summary: amendment to closing time: required documentation and bids must be submitted by may 25, 2023 at 2:00 pm edt (nda)
description: amendment to closing time: please disregard the ariba discovery posting response deadline closing time and canadabuys posting closing time. all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by may 25, 2023 at 2:00 pm edt. all bids submitted after 2:00 pm edt will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. dnd requires caretaker maintenance for springer lake survival camp in nopiming provincial park, manitoba, canada. there is a mandatory site visit associated with this requirement. this is an open competition however, this solicitation may be reserved among indigenous businesses if two conditions are met: bids from two (2) or more indigenous businesses are responsive with the mandatory requirements of this request for proposal, and bids from two (2) or more indigenous businesses are, in the evaluation team’s opinion, not affiliated within the meaning used in the competition act, r.s.c., 1985, c. c-34. if the above conditions are not met, the procurement will remain open for competition among all businesses.

full_summary:
# Tender Name
## Springer Lake Maintenance Caretaker Contract

### Contract Details

* Tender Reference Number: WS3950601658-Doc3952173326
* Solicitation Number: WS3950601658
* Publication Date: April 19, 2023
* Tender Closing Date and Time: May 25, 2023 at 14:00 HAE
* Procurement Category: Service (SRV)
* Request for Proposal (RFP) Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) Announcement

### Service Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a caretaker maintenance service provider to manage and maintain the Springer Lake Survival camp in Nopiming Provincial Park, Manitoba, Canada. A mandatory site visit is required for this contract.

### Key Dates

* Proposed Contract Start Date: N/A
* Proposed Contract End Date: July 31, 2025
* Amendment Date: May 19, 2023
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)

### Eligibility Criteria

This RFP may be reserved amongst Indigenous Businesses if two conditions are met:
* Bids from two or more Indigenous Businesses are responsive to the mandatory requirements of this RFP.
* Bids from two or more Indigenous Businesses are, in the opinion of the evaluation team, not affiliated within the meaning used in the Competition Act, R.S.C., 1985, c. C-34.

### Evaluation Criteria

The Service provider will be selected based on the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements

This RFP may be subject to various trade agreements, including:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

* Matthew Havrilenko, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not Available
* Fax: Not Available
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Attaching Documents

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 25, 2023 at 14:00 HAE. All bids submitted after
